from example_mahjong_env import WuhanMahjongEnv
env = WuhanMahjongEnv\(training_phase=1\)

# 直接在 build 方法中调用 _build_wall，传入 context.wall

result = env.state_machine.observation_builder._build_wall\(wall_at_build_time\)
print\(''Wall at build time \(first 20\):'', list\(wall_at_build_time\)[:20]\)
print\(''_build_wall result \(first 20\):'', result[:20]\)

# 现在检查 build\(\) 方法中传入的 context.wall
print\(''Context.wall length at call time:'', len\(env.context.wall\)\)
")

Bash("D:\\DATA\\Development\\Anaconda\\envs\\PettingZooRLMahjong\\python.exe" -c "
from example_mahjong_env import WuhanMahjongEnv
env = WuhanMahjongEnv\(training_phase=1\)
obs, _ = env.reset\(seed=42\)

# 保存 context.wall 的引用
wall_before_build = env.context.wall.copy\(\)

# 调用 build 方法
builder = env.state_machine.observation_builder
result = builder.build\(0, env.context\)

# 检查结果
print\(''Wall before build:'', list\(wall_before_build\)[:20]\)
print\(''Wall in observation \(first 20\):'', result[''wall''][:20]\)
print\(''Are they equal?'', list\(wall_before_build\)[:20] == list\(result[''wall''][:20]\)\)
")

Bash("D:\\DATA\\Development\\Anaconda\\envs\\PettingZooRLMahjong\\python.exe" -c "
from example_mahjong_env import WuhanMahjongEnv
env = WuhanMahjongEnv\(training_phase=1\)
obs, _ = env.reset\(seed=42\)

# 检查 build 方法中对 context.wall 的处理
import inspect
builder = env.state_machine.observation_builder

# 获取 build 方法的源代码
source = inspect.getsource\(builder.build\)
# 找到 _build_wall 调用的行
for i, line in enumerate\(source.split\(''\\n''\)\):
    if ''_build_wall'' in line:
        print\(f''Line {i}: {line}''\)
        print\(f''Previous line: {source.split\(chr\(10\)\)[i-1] if i > 0 else ""N/A""}''\)
")
